CHAT.comment: JOE HARRIS SULLIVAN, Petitioner v. FLORIDA.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:01 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BRYAN STEVENSON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER

REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF BRYAN STEVENSON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
